subject: AccuWeather.com Alert(tm) Advisory  (avcavc)
body:
AccuWeather.com Alert[TM]






















 







							Severe Watches and Warnings for BEVERLY HILLS 













LOXCFWLOX
WHUS46 KLOX 102231
CFWLOX

COASTAL HAZARD MESSAGE...RESENT
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LOS ANGELES/OXNARD CA
331 PM PDT TUE APR 10 2007

..HIGH SURF TO AFFECT WEST FACING BEACHES OF SOUTHWESTERN
CALIFORNIA...

STRONG WEST TO NORTHWEST FLOW OVER THE NEARBY WATERS WILL
GENERATE A SOMEWHAT LARGE WESTERLY SWELL. THIS WESTERLY
SWELL...COMBINED WITH A MODERATE SOUTH SWELL...WILL PRODUCE HIGH
SURF ALONG THE BEACHES OF CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA THROUGH
TONIGHT...THEN REBUILD AGAIN ON THURSDAY.

CAZ034-035-110530-
/O.CON.KLOX.SU.Y.0005.000000T0000Z-070411T1000Z/
SAN LUIS OBISPO COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
SANTA BARBARA COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
331 PM PDT TUE APR 10 2007

..HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT WEDNESDAY...

A HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT WEDNESDAY.

SEVEN TO TEN FOOT BREAKERS CAN BE EXPECTED THROUGH TONIGHT ON
EXPOSED WEST AND SOUTHWEST FACING BEACHES...WITH DANGEROUS RIP
POSSIBLE. SURF WILL SUBSIDE ON WEDNESDAY BUT IS EXPECTED TO
REBUILD ON THURSDAY AND MAY REQUIRE ANOTHER HIGH SURF ADVISORY.

$$

CAZ039>041-110530-
/O.EXT.KLOX.CF.S.0003.000000T0000Z-070413T0600Z/
SANTA BARBARA COUNTY SOUTH COAST-VENTURA COUNTY COAST-
LOS ANGELES COUNTY COAST INCLUDING DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES-
331 PM PDT TUE APR 10 2007

..HIGHER THAN NORMAL SURF EXPECTED...

FOUR TO SIX FOOT BREAKERS ARE EXPECTED ALONG FAVORABLY EXPOSED
SOUTHWEST FACING BEACHES THROUGH THURSDAY NIGHT. MAXIMUM SETS UP
TO 7 FT ARE POSSIBLE AND DANGEROUS RIP CURRENTS ARE POSSIBLE.
SURF SHOULD PEAK WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY...AND A HIGH
SURF ADVISORY MAY BE NEEDED FOR THAT PERIOD.

$$

KITTELL
